ygData.subject: Re: Gordon's snide comments
ygData.msgSnippet: We (me and 2 fiends) camped Meldrath last night (his ranger twink needs something off Mel).  I conned the little bugger and was surprised to see blue at 47.
ygData.messageBody:
We (me and 2 fiends) camped Meldrath last night (his ranger twink needs
something off Mel). I conned the little bugger and was surprised to see
blue at 47. Got xp too!

Sylly

p.s. anyone know the con ranges? e.g.: same level = white/black con; 1 and
2 levels higher = yellow; 3 or more higher = red; 1 to 10 (or is it more)
levels lower = blue; greater than 10 lower = green. And at what levels does
this change?


----- Original Message -----
From: <kim@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, February 18, 2000 12:18 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Gordon's snide comments


> > spawn. Additionally, I have read the hero is level 35 - does anyone
think
> > it is possible to solo him at level 40 or does he hit like a giant?

> (They also
> upgraded Meldrath to mid-high 30s, and lowered the mino guards
> to 20s.)
